Adhere: An object is covered in extremely sticky slime.
Anchor: A strong wire sprouts from your arms, affixing itself to two points within 50ft on each side.
Animate Object: An object obeys your commands as best it can.
Anthropomorphize: An animal either gains human intelligence or human appearance for one day.
Arcane Eye: You can see through a magical floating eyeball that flies around at your command.
Astral Prison: An object is frozen in time and space within an invulnerable crystal shell.
Attract: Two objects are strongly magnetically attracted to each other if they come within 10 feet.
Auditory Illusion: You create illusory sounds that seem to come from a direction of your choice.
Babble: A creature must loudly and clearly repeat everything you think. It is otherwise mute.
Bait Flower: A plant sprouts from the ground that emanates the smell of decaying flesh.
Beast Form: You and your possessions transform into a mundane animal.
Befuddle: A creature of your choice is unable to form new short-term memories for the duration of the spell.
Body Swap: You switch bodies with a creature you touch. If one body dies, the other dies as well.
Charm: A creature you can see treats you as a friend.
Comprehend: You become fluent in all languages for a short while.
Command: A target obeys a single three-word command that does not cause it harm.
Cone of Foam: Dense foam sprays from your hand, coating the target.
Control Plants: Nearby plants and trees obey you and gain the ability to move at a slow pace.
Control Weather: You may alter the type of weather at will, but you do not otherwise control it.
Cure Wounds: Restore 1d4 STR per day to a creature you can touch.
Detect Magic: You can see or hear nearby magical auras.
Disassemble: Any of your body parts may be detached and reattached at will, without causing pain or damage. You can still control them.
Disguise: You may alter the appearance of one character at will as long as they remain humanoid. Attempts to duplicate other characters will seem uncanny.
Displace: An object appears to be up to 15ft from its actual position.
Earthquake: The ground begins shaking violently. Structures may be damaged or collapse.
Elasticity: Your body can stretch up to 10ft.
Elemental Wall: A straight wall of ice or fire 50ft long and 10ft high rises from the ground.
Filch: A visible item teleports to your hands.
Flare: A bright ball of energy fires a trail of light into the sky, revealing your location to friend or foe.
Fog Cloud: A dense fog spreads out from you.
Frenzy: A nearby creature erupts in a frenzy of violence.
Gate: A portal to a random plane opens.
Gravity Shift: You can change the direction of gravity, but only for yourself.
Greed: A creature develops the overwhelming urge to possess a visible item of your choice.
Hatred: A creature develops a deep hatred of another creature or group and wishes to destroy them.
Hear Whispers: You can hear faint sounds clearly.
Hover: An object hovers, frictionless, 2ft above the ground. It can hold up to one humanoid.
Hypnotize: A creature enters a trance and will truthfully answer one yes or no question you ask it.
Icy Touch: A thick ice layer spreads across a touched surface, up to 10ft in radius.
Identify Owner: Letters appear over the object you touch, spelling out the name of the object's owners, if there are any.
Illuminate: A floating light moves as you command.
Invisible Tether: Two objects within 10ft of each other cannot be moved more than 10ft apart.
Knock: A nearby mundane or magical lock unlocks – loudly.
Leap: You jump up to 10ft high, once.
Liquid Air: The air around you becomes swimmable.
Magic Dampener: All nearby magical effects have their effectiveness halved.
Manse: A sturdy, furnished cottage appears for 12 hours. You can permit and forbid entry to it at will.
Marble Craze: Your pockets are full of marbles, and will refill every 30 seconds.
Masquerade: A character’s appearance and voice becomes identical to those of a character you touch.
Miniaturize: A creature you touch is shrunk down to the size of a mouse.
Mirror Image: An illusory duplicate of yourself appears and is under your control.
Mirrorwalk: A mirror becomes a gateway to another mirror that you looked into today.
Multiarm: You temporarily gain an extra arm.
Night Sphere: A 50ft wide sphere of darkness displaying the night sky appears before you.
Objectify: You become any inanimate object between the size of a grand piano and an apple.
Pacify: A creature near you has an aversion to violence.
Phobia: A nearby creature becomes terrified of an object of your choice.
Pit: A pit 10ft wide and 10ft deep opens in the ground.
Primal Surge: A creature rapidly evolves into a future version of its species.
Push/Pull: An object of any size is pulled directly towards you or pushed directly away from you with the strength of one man.
Raise Dead: A skeleton rises from the ground to serve you. They are incredibly stupid and can only obey simple orders.
Raise Spirit: The spirit of a nearby corpse manifests and will answer 1 question.
Read Mind: You can hear the surface thoughts of nearby creatures.
Repel: Two objects are strongly magnetically repelled from each other within 10 feet.
Scry: You can see through the eyes of a creature you touched earlier today.
Sculpt Elements: Inanimate material behaves like clay in your hands.
Sense: Choose one kind of object (key, gold, arrow, jug, etc.). You can sense the nearest example.
Shield: A creature you touch is protected from mundane attacks for one minute.
Shroud: A creature you touch is invisible until they move.
Shuffle: Two creatures you can see instantly switch places.
Sleep: A creature you can see falls into a light sleep.
Slick: Every surface in a 30ft radius becomes extremely slippery.
Smoke Form: Your body becomes a living smoke that you can control.
Sniff: You can smell even the faintest traces of scents.
Snuff: The source of any mundane light you can see is instantly snuffed out.
Sort: Inanimate items sort themselves according to categories you set.
Spectacle: A clearly false but impressive illusion of your choice appears, under your control. It may be up to the size of a palace and has full motion and sound.
Spellsaw: A whirling blade flies from your chest, clearing any plant material in its way. It is otherwise harmless.
Spider Climb: You can climb surfaces like a spider.
Summon Cube: Once per second you may summon or banish a 3-foot-wide cube of earth. New cubes must be affixed to the earth or to other cubes.
Swarm: You become a swarm of crows, rats, or piranhas. You can only be harmed by blast attacks.
Telekinesis: You may mentally move 1 item under 60lbs.
Telepathy: Two creatures can hear each other’s thoughts, no matter how far apart.
Teleport: An object or person you can see is transported from one place to another in a 50ft radius.
Target Lure: An object you touch becomes the target of any nearby spell.
Thicket: A thicket of trees and dense brush up to 50ft wide suddenly sprouts up.
Summon Idol: A carved stone statue the size of a mule rises from the ground.
Time Control: Time in a 50ft bubble slows down or increases by 10% for 30 seconds.
True Sight: You see through all nearby illusions.
Vision: You completely control what a creature sees.
Visual Illusion: A silent, immobile, room-sized illusion of your choice appears.
Ward: A silver circle 50ft across appears on the ground. Choose one species that cannot cross it.
Widget: A primitive version of a drawn tool or item appears before you and disappears after a short time.
Wizard Mark: Your finger can shoot a stream of ulfire-colored paint. This paint is only visible to you and can be seen at any distance, even through solid objects.
X-Ray Vision: You can see through walls, dirt, clothing, etc.
